message_1: Sorry, but Deontic logic is a subject in philosophy that deals with the logic of obligation, permission, prohibition, and related concepts. It does not make sense to formulate a precise numerical problem in this field. Can I help you with anything else?
message_2: As a mathematician, I can help you with any mathematical problems or concepts you'd like to explore. Please feel free to ask any math-related questions, and I'll be happy to assist you.
